issue.title: [CF 1570] Enhancement: Combo buff/debuff + Cooldown icon type
issue.body:
At least half of my icons end up having to be meta icons based on a combination of buff/debuff and cooldown icons, since that's so common for me (and maybe others) I'd like to see a combo icon type that handles both in one.  Alternatively, if there's a way to do that currently with a single conditional icon I can do it that way if it is possible, just haven't figured out how to do that while showing both timers appropriately..


> Posted by CurseForge user ray_smith | Imported from CurseForge issue #1570 | Raw

comments.body:
That's exactly what meta icons are for.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
